product_name: The North Face Anna Purna High-Rise Boots - Women's
long_description: Show off your cosmopolitan style and street smarts in the sleek, waterproof Anna Purna High-Rise boots from The North Face. Waterproof velvet suede leather uppers combine with water-resistant baffled polyester cuffs for solid protection against stormy winter weather. Waterproof thermoplastic rubber shell bottoms provide durable protection where most elements are met. Ample and lofty 200g PrimaLoft(R) Eco insulation throughout offers warmth in wintry conditions. Faux fur collars add a touch of style and help keep snow out of boots. Dual-density EVA midsoles in The North Face Anna Purna High-Rise boots provide cushioning against shock. TNF Winter Grip(TM) rubber outsoles supply tenacious traction in wet, slick conditions; omnidirectional lugs are both grippy and self-cleaning. Temperature-sensitive Ice Pick(TM) rubber lugs on outsoles harden when temps fall below freezing, providing extra bite into the terrain.
short_description: Show off your cosmopolitan style and street smarts in the sleek, waterproof Anna Purna High-Rise boots from The North Face.
